Public Remarks: Welcome to this charming Hester Park home located in the Rose Garden, offering a delightful blend of comfort and character. Large picture windows adorn the living and dining rooms, infusing the space with natural light and serene views. Hardwood floors grace the entry, living, dining, and hallway areas, while cozy wood flooring enhances the bedrooms. The living room features a fireplace surrounded by bookcases, complemented by windows that welcome warm sunlight indoors. Recessed ceilings add elegance to the entry, living, and dining rooms. Step into the kitchen, where a charming swinging door, newly glazed sink and counters, new tile flooring, and a gas stove create an inviting culinary space.The updated bathroom offers double sinks, a tub with shower, and tiled flooring for a fresh feel. A spacious laundry room adds convenience to daily routines. Recent updates include freshly painted interiors and exteriors, along with new landscaping featuring lush sod and fruit trees. For storage or workspace, a detached single-car garage and basement provides versatility. Enjoy walking to restaurants and parks, with proximity to freeways 880 and 280, as well as Diridon Station. Walk Score: 80 | Bike Score: 79 San Jose Unified School District: Trace Elementary, Hoover Middle, Lincoln High

Step outside to discover the beautifully landscaped backyard with lush foliage and space for gardening or outdoor dining. Explore nearby parks, shopping and dining. Commuters will appreciate the close proximity to 880 and 280. Plus Diridon station and San Jose Airport are minutes away.

Public Remarks: English Tudor Revival home beautifully marries historic charm with modern amenities. Picture perfect storybook architecture w/ multiple gables & romantic lines. Updated kitchen w/ newly refinished hardwood floors, quartz countertops, farmhouse sink & Thermador 6-burner range. Paneled refrigerator & dishwasher blend in the custom white cabinetry. Ground floor bedroom & full bathroom w/ tile flooring & beadboard wainscoting. Upstairs are two bedrooms w/ attractive gable roof lines. Shared hall bathroom w/ mosaic tile floor & subway tile. In the backyard, an inviting gazebo w/ bistro lights & assortment of roses and shrubs surround the lush lawn area w/ gardening area. Oversized detached, two-car garage sits at the end of the long driveway. Conveniently located to downtown San Jose and highways 280, 680 and 87.

Public Remarks: We have made a major price reduction and the family is motivated to sell soon. This home borders the Rose Garden neighborhood. It appraised in Feb, 2023 for $1.750,000 and it's one of the largest homes in the St Leo's neighborhood A spacious two car garage fronts the property, rolling into an attractive courtyard and then to the front door of the home. It features 4 large bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, 2,387 sq.ft living space on a 5,850 sq.ft. lot. There is a laundry room with views to the backyard. The home has been freshly painted, the hardwood floors have all been beautifully refinished and other upgrades have made this home ready to move in. There is lot's of storage space inside and outside. The large courtyard area is perfect for relaxing, but also ideal for gatherings with family/friends or as a children's play area/day. Nice backyard. The location is perfect for those looking to live near Downtown San Jose, as you are able to walk to the excellent restaurants and shops along The Alameda, the SAP Center, Diridon Station (Caltrain/Amtrak), Wholefoods, San Pedro Square and the Guadalupe River Trail. As well, Santana Row and the proposed Google Village are just minutes away. SJSU and SCU are also in close proximity. Easy commute access. This is a great opportunity.
